title: Submit contact form successfully with valid inputs
description: Verifies a visitor can submit the contact form with valid name, email, and message and sees a success confirmation.

steps.description: Type "Alex Johnson" into the Name field
Type "Hi, I’m interested in learning more about your services. Please contact me." into the Message field

title: Inline validation: invalid email format blocks submission
description: Verifies that an invalid email shows an inline validation error after attempting to submit.

steps.description: Type "Taylor Smith" into the Name field
Type "Please send me more information." into the Message field

title: Required field validation: missing name shows inline error
description: Verifies the form shows a required-field error when the name is missing and submit is clicked.

steps.description: Type "Hello, please reach out." into the Message field

title: Required field validation: missing email shows inline error
description: Verifies the form shows a required-field error when the email is missing and submit is clicked.

steps.description: Type "Sam Patel" into the Name field
Type "Hello, I’d like a callback." into the Message field

title: Required field validation: missing message shows inline error
description: Verifies the form shows a required-field error when the message is missing and submit is clicked.

steps.description: Type "Morgan Chen" into the Name field

title: Correcting invalid email clears the validation error and allows submission
description: Verifies a visitor can fix an invalid email and then successfully submit the form.

steps.description: Type "Casey Nguyen" into the Name field

title: Form supports longer message content and still submits
description: Verifies the message field accepts a longer message and submission still results in a visible confirmation.

steps.description: Type "Riley Adams" into the Name field

Type "Hello team, I’m reaching out regarding a potential project. We’re evaluating vendors for strategy, design, and implementation. Please share your process, estimated timelines, and how you typically scope engagements. Thank you." into the Message field
